title: The Bishop of Armaghes direction, concerning the lyturgy, and episcopall government Being thereunto requested by the Honourable, the House of Commons, and then presented in the year 1642.
author: Udall, Ephraim, d. 1647.
notes: Not in fact by James Ussher, Bishop of Armagh, but by Ephraim Udall.
Originally published in 1641 as: Directions propounded and humbly presented to the High Court of Parliament, concerning the Booke of Common Prayer and episcopall government.
This edition has a woodcut ornament of a Tudor rose on title page.
Caption title on p. 1 reads: Bishop of Armaghs direction.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
